fileio.cpp

00001 /* FILEIO.C
00002  Functions responsible for loading data from files, such as the one that
00003  decodes the level map files (loadmap()) and the one that loads in the
00004  tile attribute data contained in ep?attr.dat (loadtileattributes()).
00005  The functions for loading the graphics (EGALATCH&EGASPRIT) are in latch.c.
00006  */

00023 #define uint unsigned int
00024 #define ulong unsigned long

00026 
00027 unsigned int fgeti(FILE *fp) {
00028  unsigned int lsb, msb;
00029  lsb = fgetc(fp);
00030  msb = fgetc(fp);
00031  return (msb<<8) | lsb;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void fputi(uint word, FILE *fp)
00035 {
00036  fputc(word&255, fp);
00037  fputc(word/256, fp);
00038 }
00039 
00040 unsigned long fgetl(FILE *fp) {
00041  unsigned int temp1, temp2, temp3, temp4;
00042  temp1 = fgetc(fp);
00043  temp2 = fgetc(fp);
00044  temp3 = fgetc(fp);
00045  temp4 = fgetc(fp);
00046  return (temp4<<24) | (temp3<<16) | (temp2<<8) | temp1;
00047 }
00048 
00049 unsigned long fgetl(std::ifstream &file) {
00050  int temp1, temp2, temp3, temp4;
00051  temp1 = file.get();
00052  temp2 = file.get();
00053  temp3 = file.get();
00054  temp4 = file.get();
00055  return (temp4<<24) | (temp3<<16) | (temp2<<8) | temp1;
00056 }
00057 
00058 word fgetw(std::ifstream &file) {
00059  int temp1, temp2;
00060  temp1 = file.get();
00061  temp2 = file.get();
00062  return (temp2<<8) | temp1;
00063 }

00065 
00066 void fputl(unsigned long word, FILE *fp)
00067 {
00068  unsigned long a,b,c,d;
00069  a=b=c=d = word;
00070  a &= 0xFF000000; a >>= 24;
00071  b &= 0x00FF0000; b >>= 16;
00072  c &= 0x0000FF00; c >>= 8;
00073  d &= 0x000000FF;
00074  fputc(d, fp);
00075  fputc(c, fp);
00076  fputc(b, fp);
00077  fputc(a, fp);
00078 }
